summary: This document is an email chain from August 2019 regarding overtime staffing at a correctional facility. It details the number of staff working voluntary versus mandated overtime on August 9-10, 2019, specifically noting Correctional Officer Noel was mandated. The email is addressed to a 'Boss' and references forwarding information to an Acting Director.

persons.name: Noel
persons.context: Identified as the only staff member who was mandated to work overtime on August 10, 2019, from 12 am to 8 am.

events.title: Overtime Staffing Period 1
events.description: From 4 pm to 12 am, 6 staff were hired for overtime, all voluntarily.

events.title: Overtime Staffing Period 2
events.description: From 12 am to 8 am, 10 staff were hired for overtime; 9 were voluntary and 1 (Correctional Officer Noel) was mandated.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email about correctional facility staffing dated August 14, 2019.
On August 9, 2019 (4pm-12am), 6 staff worked overtime, all voluntarily.
On August 10, 2019 (12am-8am), 10 staff worked overtime; 9 were voluntary and 1, Correctional Officer Noel, was mandated.
The email chain indicates a request for this staffing information to be sent to an Acting Director.
